text: Buckley ( ) is a town and community in Flintshire, north-east Wales, from the county town of Mold. Buckley is the second largest town in Flintshire in terms of population. At the 2011 Census, its community had a population of 15,665. When the contiguous Argoed community is included, Buckley has a population of 21,502. ==References== Category:Towns in Flintshire
title: Buckley
